translations.modules.cache.get.label: Cache Get
translations.modules.cache.get.description: Get a value from cache by key
translations.modules.cache.get.params.key.label: Cache Key
translations.modules.cache.get.params.key.description: The cache key to look up
translations.modules.cache.get.params.backend.label: Backend
translations.modules.cache.get.params.redis_url.label: Redis URL
translations.modules.cache.get.output.value.descripti: The cached value (null if not found)
translations.modules.cache.get.output.hit.description: Whether the key was found in cache
translations.modules.cache.set.label: Cache Set
translations.modules.cache.set.description: Set a value in cache with optional TTL
translations.modules.cache.set.params.key.label: Cache Key
translations.modules.cache.set.params.key.description: The cache key to store the value under
translations.modules.cache.set.params.value.label: Value
translations.modules.cache.set.params.value.descripti: The value to cache (any JSON-serializable value)
translations.modules.cache.set.params.ttl.label: TTL (seconds)
translations.modules.cache.set.params.backend.label: Backend
translations.modules.cache.set.params.redis_url.label: Redis URL
translations.modules.cache.set.output.stored.descript: Whether the value was stored successfully
translations.modules.cache.set.output.ttl.description: The TTL in seconds (0 = no expiry)
translations.modules.cache.delete.label: Cache Delete
translations.modules.cache.delete.description: Delete a cache entry by key
translations.modules.cache.delete.params.key.label: Cache Key
translations.modules.cache.delete.output.deleted.desc: Whether the key was found and deleted
translations.modules.cache.clear.label: Cache Clear
translations.modules.cache.clear.description: Clear all cache entries or filter by pattern
translations.modules.cache.clear.params.pattern.label: Pattern
translations.modules.cache.clear.params.pattern.descr: Glob pattern to match keys (e.g. "user:*", default "*" clears all)
translations.modules.cache.clear.params.backend.label: Backend
